trends: There have been no other sightings in Woodson Terrace
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswhile watching tv; i saw saw a very low and large glowing red\orange light out of the corner of my eye. i grabbed my cousin and we watched it move from west to east. at times it glowed very bright then dim again. no other lights were on it. we watched if for approx 4-5 min. on at least two occasions it looked as if it stopped in mid air. we took note of the time and returned to our movie (both a bit amazed by what we had just seen). approx. 6-7 min later we saw a second cylinder just like the first; but much closer to our home. we do live close to the airport, and have scene thousands of planes, but this was close enough that we could distinguish that this was not a plane. again it was a low, red\orange glowing cylinder moving east to west. this time we ran outside and watched it for approx. 8 minutes. neither one of us had ever scene anything like this and we have lived by the airport for many years. we were both quite stunned and began to call the local tv stations; but there were no other reports at this time. we were then given a number to call and directed to this website. if anyone else saw this we would be glad to hear about it. thank you.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
